activities: Proforma is a consumer reporting agency (CRA) and provides background screening reports to its customers.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Proforma collects and processes, via both manual and automated processes, personally identifiable information including but not limited to: names; birth dates; addresses; social security numbers; unique identifiers; employment history and criminal records.
recoursemech: BBB EU Safe Harbor Program, reference no. EU5390808-27-15.
